Class KeywordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • KeywordReader

  • public class KeywordReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Java program that can read .csv file and .pdf file to obtain keywords

    • Method Detail

      • readCsv

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readCsv(java.io.File csvFileToRead)
        readCsv - Read given csv file and return keywords from this file
        Parameters:
        csvFileToRead - - name of file to read
        Returns:
        keywords - array list of strings that includes keywords from the file. Return null if file reading is unsuccessful.

      • readPdf

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readPdf(java.io.File pdfFileToRead)
        readPdf - Read given PDF file. Ignore image and extract whole text. Takenize the whole text and treat each word as one keyword
        Parameters:
        pdfFileToRead - - name of pdf file to read
        Returns:
        keywords - array list of strings that includes keywords from the file. Return null if file reading is unsuccessful.
